S

scanForData(int, int) - Method in class essentials.Scanner
Scans for data, which should include both light sources and obstacles.
scanForLight(int) - Method in class essentials.Scanner
Gets the light value from the sensor and overwrites the saved light value if we've found a higher one.
scanForObjects(int) - Method in class essentials.Scanner
Tells the obstacle detector to find any obstacles that we're looking at.
Scanner - Class in essentials
The scanner has access to the entire rotating sensor apparatus, so as to allow us to control the entire apparatus and get many kinds of data from it, as opposed to needing the light sensors and the ultrasonic sensors to each take control of the motor.
Scanner(NXTRegulatedMotor, LightSensor) - Constructor for class essentials.Scanner
 
ScanRecorder - Class in experimental
records the results of a 180 degree scan (angle and light intensity to a dataLogger and plays it back over a USB port
ScanRecorder(NXTRegulatedMotor, LightSensor) - Constructor for class experimental.ScanRecorder
 
scanTo(int) - Method in class experimental.ScanRecorder
scan from current head angle to limit angle and write the angle and light sensor value to the datalog
scanTo(int) - Method in class experimental.UltrasonicTest
 
setObstacleListener(ObstacleListener) - Method in class essentials.ObstacleDetector
Attaches an obstacle listener to the obstacle detector.
setSpeed(int) - Method in class experimental.ScanRecorder
sets the motor sped in deg/sec
stop() - Method in class essentials.Mover
Just stops the pilot.
